name: Cloud Surrounded Fate
description:
Originally Made For 
Ludum Dare 50: Delay The Inevitable

Controls:

Arrow Keys
X = Slash

(btw screen wrapping is a thing)

You are a sky-pirate and have been tracked down by death himself to collect your soul, but you won't give up without a fight! But is it possible to kill death? (No) Dodge death's attacks and stun him with your sword while jumping around on a swinging platform. How long can you survive until you reach your inevitable cloud surrounded fate? 

I might update the game after the jam ends as  I have some improvements in mind..
